TEXT.TITLE: <ENCOR ENERGY CORP INC> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr not given Net loss 406.6 mln vs profit 35.4 mln Revs 138.1 mln vs 211.9 mln Note: 1986 net includes 545.7 mln dlr asset writedown before 139.2 mln dlr recovery of deferred taxes. 48 pct-owned by Dome Petroleum Ltd <DMP>. Reuter
